Package ohos.media.common

Class StorageProperty.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.common.StorageProperty.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    StorageProperty

    public static class StorageProperty.Builder
extends Object
    Static inner class of StorageProperty used to create a StorageProperty object.
    Since:
    1

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Builder​()
      Default constructor used to create a Builder instance.
      Builder​(StorageProperty property)
      A constructor used to create a Builder instance based on a StorageProperty object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      StorageProperty build​()
      Creates a StorageProperty object for audio and video recording.
      StorageProperty.Builder setRecorderFd​(FileDescriptor recorderFd)
      Sets a file descriptor object of the file to be written.
      StorageProperty.Builder setRecorderFile​(File recorderFile)
      Sets a file object to be written.
      StorageProperty.Builder setRecorderMaxDurationMs​(int recorderMaxDurationMs)
      Sets the maximum recording duration (in milliseconds).
      StorageProperty.Builder setRecorderMaxFileSizeBytes​(long recorderMaxFileSizeBytes)
      Sets the maximum file size (in bytes) of a recording session.
      StorageProperty.Builder setRecorderPath​(String recorderPath)
      Sets an output file path.
